item.title: Terraform: Add Group Members as Owners to a Service Principal or Az AD Application
item.description: Currently, there is no option for adding a Group as an Owner to a Service Principal or Azure AD Application. If you try you will most likely run into the following error: unexpected status 400 with OData error: Request_BadRequest: The reference target â”‚ 'Group_0000000-0000-000000-000000' of type 'Group' is invalid for the 'owners' reference. This is a quick post on how you can add members of an Az AD Group as Owners of a Service Principal or Azure AD Application.
